trans-unit.source: This topic provides you with instruction and pointers to set up your computer on which you will perform the steps to set up the hybrid integration scenario described in <link xlink:href="eeafa523-a79d-48e0-9ae0-c91d5b87a721" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Using Service Bus EAI and EDI Labs to Integrate with an On-Premises SAP Server</link>.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides you with instruction and pointers to set up your computer on which you will perform the steps to set up the hybrid integration scenario described in <link xlink:href="eeafa523-a79d-48e0-9ae0-c91d5b87a721" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Using Service Bus EAI and EDI Labs to Integrate with an On-Premises SAP Server</link>.

trans-unit.source: You must do the following to set up your computer:
trans-unit.target: You must do the following to set up your computer:

trans-unit.source: You use this SDK to configure and deploy the <token>one-way</token> that sits between the EDI agreement and the relay endpoint.
trans-unit.target: You use this SDK to configure and deploy the <token>one-way</token> that sits between the EDI agreement and the relay endpoint.

trans-unit.source: You use this to expose the <embeddedLabel>Send</embeddedLabel> operation on an IDOC as a relay endpoint on <token>sb2</token>.You can download the installer from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You use this to expose the <embeddedLabel>Send</embeddedLabel> operation on an IDOC as a relay endpoint on <token>sb2</token>.You can download the installer from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <token>af_integration</token> installation guide at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=237092</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=237092</linkUri></externalLink> to install the software prerequisites for <token>af_integration</token> SDK and <token>lobconnect</token>.
trans-unit.target: Refer to the <token>af_integration</token> installation guide at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=237092</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=237092</linkUri></externalLink> to install the software prerequisites for <token>af_integration</token> SDK and <token>lobconnect</token>.

trans-unit.source: This is required for installing the <token>bap</token> on the computer.
trans-unit.target: This is required for installing the <token>bap</token> on the computer.

trans-unit.source: This contains the SAP adapter that is required to establish connectivity to an SAP Server and for exposing SAP artifacts as operations.
trans-unit.target: This contains the SAP adapter that is required to establish connectivity to an SAP Server and for exposing SAP artifacts as operations.

trans-unit.source: The SAP adapter needs these libraries to connect to an SAP Server.
trans-unit.target: The SAP adapter needs these libraries to connect to an SAP Server.

trans-unit.source: For information on where to install the SAP client libraries from, refer to the Adapter Pack installation guide (BizTalkAdapterPack_InstallationGuide.htm) at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240161</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240161</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For information on where to install the SAP client libraries from, refer to the Adapter Pack installation guide (BizTalkAdapterPack_InstallationGuide.htm) at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240161</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240161</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Download and extract the <embeddedLabel>EDI message schemas</embeddedLabel> (MicrosoftEdiXSDTemplates.zip) available at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Download and extract the <embeddedLabel>EDI message schemas</embeddedLabel> (MicrosoftEdiXSDTemplates.zip) available at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: This contains the X12 850 Purchase Order message schema that is required for the business scenario we use for this article.
trans-unit.target: This contains the X12 850 Purchase Order message schema that is required for the business scenario we use for this article.

trans-unit.source: After you have finished installing and downloading these components, you are ready to start setting up the business scenario.
trans-unit.target: After you have finished installing and downloading these components, you are ready to start setting up the business scenario.
